detaileddescription.para: DWAX random length generate.

Holds the amount of bytes which should be generated. Used as parameter in function CsmPi_RandomGenerate.
Value 1U.
Used in DWAX_Adapter function.

Used to enable or disable functionalities in function DWAX_Adapter.
If DWAXMRRAIMUNDFEARS is not enabled, DWA will trasmit to the Siren the MasterCode in order to arm the Siren by the signal bStSounderCode. If MasterCode is not generated and not stored successfully in NVRam, it should be set to 0. If DWAXMRRAIMUNDFEARS is enabled, DWA will trasmit to the Siren the MasterCode in order to arm the Siren by the signal bStSounderCode.
Used in functions to check the activation of DTCs.

Used to check if some DTCs are active, and if they are active, some signals shall pe write to 0, otherwise to 1.
Value is DEM_UDS_STATUS_TF, which is 0x01U. This indicates the first bit of RTE_TYPE_Dem_EventStatusExtendedType(defines the Event Status byte). If this bit is set to 1, it represents that the test failed.
DWA arming status activation threshold. Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStDWAStatus function.

Represends the limit (threshold) value where the DWA armed status can change. If the signal enStDWAStatus is greater or equal to 2, DWA armed status is armed. If the signal enStDWAStatus is less than 2, DWA armed status not armed.
Value 2U.
DWAX stand heating activation threshold for GSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll) and GFSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizung function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizung (climate heating status) can change. It checks if Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll (voltage klima for motor front) or Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll(voltage klima for motor rear) are less or equal than 253.
Value 253U.
DWAX stand heating activation threshold for GS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status) and GFS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizung function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizung (climate heating status) can change. It checks if Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status (FAN status) or Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status (FAN status rear) are less or equal than 10.
Value 10U.
DWAX stand heating error activation threshold for GSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll) and GFSA(Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizungErr function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizungErr (climate heating status error) can change. It checks if Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll (voltage klima for motor front) or Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll(voltage klima for motor rear) are greater or equal than 254.
Value 254U.
DWAX stand heating error activation threshold for GS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status) and GFS(Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status). Used in DWAX_SignalHandle__bStStandheizungErr function.

Represends the limit (threshold, boundary) value where bStStandheizungErr (climate heating status error) can change. It checks if Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status (FAN status) or Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status (FAN status rear) are greater than 10.
Value 10U.
DWAX MasterCode incorrect value. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_NVM_RESTORED and DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE functions.

Used for checking invalid mastercode values. If the MasterCode has 0xFFu value, a restart procedure will be triggered, otherwise the MasterCode is correct.
Value 0XFFu.
DWAX MasterCode incorrect value. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_NVM_RESTORED and DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE functions.

Used for checking invalid mastercode values. If the MasterCode has 0x00u value, a restart procedure will be triggered, otherwise the MasterCode is correct.
Value 0X00u.
DWAX MasterCode maximum number of retries. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE and DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_SAVE_MASTERCODE_VERIFY functions.

Used to represent the maximum number of retries. If it is less or equal to 2, then the MasterCode is stored succesfully in EEPROM. Otherwise, a problem occured and MasterCode shall be set to 0.
Value 2u.
CAN Mirror offset.

Offset from OSEK_Buffer_Start to RTE_Buffer_Star.
value 0x01000000UL
Call of CsmPi_RandomSeedStart function used to start seeding. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_START_SEED_GENERATION function.

Used to call the functions that returns the status used to start seeding. This function requests the initialization of the Random state which has been given in the passed configuration. The state initialization function of the configured primitive is called and its return value is returned. Returns CSMPI_E_OK (if the seeding start was successfully requested) or CSMPI_E_BUSY(if another service of Random is already running).
Value is Rte_Call_DWAX_CsmPi_DwaRandom_RandomSeedStart, which is a define for CsmPi_RandomSeedStart(CsmPi_DwaRandom).
Call CsmPi_RandomGenerate function used to generate pseudo random bytes. Used in DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_START_RANDOM_GENERATION function.

Used to call the functions that returns the status used to generate pseudo random bytes. This function requests the generation of pseudo random bytes. The byte generation function of the configured primitive is called and its return value is returned. Returns CSMPI_E_OK(if the byte generation was successfully requested) or CSMPI_E_BUSY(if another service of the Random is already running).
Value is Rte_Call_DWAX_CsmPi_DwaRandom_RandomGenerate, which is a define for CsmPi_RandomGenerate(CsmPi_DwaRandom, im1, DWAX_RANDOM_LENGTH_GENERATE).
For SWATT testing
SWATT bypassing used for testing.
RTE Read Typedef.
Typedef used for RTE Read function pointers.
Delayed timeout array.

This array stores the delayed timeout status for CANs defined in CAN_State enum (CCAN, EVCAN, KCAN).
range True if the timeout has elapsed False otherwise values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_CAN_TimeoutDelayElapsedState, DWAX_errorStatusDelayCounter protection none storage class init ram
Pointer array to functions that return Std_ReturnType.

This array points to functions like Rte_Read_DWAX_WakeupSleep_s_[CAN_BUS]_Comm_Active, which provide CAN_BUS activity status.
range Std_ReturnType - see Std_Types.h values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_CheckCANstate protection none storage class init ram
This flag shows that the lib was initialized. (DWAX_InitVarFunc)

Allows the library's functions to run. (DWAX_TaskCyclicEvent)
range True if DWAX_InitVarFunc is called False otherwise values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_InitVarFunc, DWAX_Stop, DWAX_TaskCyclicEvent protection none storage class init ram
Delay counter for enAnhaengerErrSt.

This variable is used for counting 50ms in order to delay the enAnhaengerErrSt signal in case of NoError transmission.
range uint8 values this variable will increase to 50 (maximum delay timer) unit N/A resolution N/A context DWAX_InitVarFunc, DWAX_CanMessageErrorStatusHandling_enAnhaengerErrSt protection none storage class init ram
Structure used to store important DWAX data elements.

DWAX structure containing the state of master code, state of Nvm, random number, number of retries, indicator for CsmPi generation of random number.
range DWAX_structure_t values unit N/A resolution N/A context Task cyclic context protection none storage class init ram

Helper function. Function handles states of MasterCode generation.

According to the state of the MasterCode, the right action will be taken.
DWAX_SignalHandle should be called before
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWAX_Data.StateOfMasterCode [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_INIT [in] DWAX_NVM_RESTORED [in] DWAX_START_WAIT_FOR_ARMING_REQUEST [in] DWAX_START_GENERATE_PROCEDURE [in] DWAX_START_SEED_GENERATION [in] DWAX_START_RANDOM_GENERATION [in] DWAX_START_RANDOM_VERIFY [in] DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE [in] DWAX_WAITING_FOR_SAVE [in] DWAX_SAVE_MASTERCODE_VERIFY [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_GENERATED [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_SAFEFAIL [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
DWAX_Data.StateOfMasterCode takes one value of MasterCode states. Based on the DWAX_Data.StateOfMasterCode status, the corresponding action will be taken.
reentrant No context DWAX_TaskCyclicEvent function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check if the corresponfing action is taken according to the state of the MasterCode. TEST_DWAX_Task__DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function which decides what action shall be taken according to the state of MasterCode.
Function used to monitor the communication with the ATWS sensor via LIN using the signal enStDWASensorKommErrSt.

Functions which sets enStDWASensorKommErrSt signal to 1 if some DTCs are active, otherwise to 0.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWAX_TASK_DWA_verbaut [in] DWAX_TASK_sensor_aktiv [in] DWAX_TASK_DEM_BIT_CHECK [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
DWAX_TASK_DWA_verbaut and DWAX_TASK_sensor_aktiv used to check if preconditions for enStDWASensorKommErrSt activation are met. DWAX_TASK_DEM_BIT_CHECK used to check if some DTCs are active. DTC 0x04090E = internal error DTC 0x040904 = no signal/communication DTC 0x100154 = electrical error DTC 0X100254 = no communication on LIN4
reentrant No context DWAX_SignalHandle function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Call Sequence

Traceability

Globals
IpduStatus_SAM_01 [in] - represents the message status for SAM_01 IPdu K2CAN_BUS [in] - represents the CAN used
Input->Output-Correlation
Set the SAM_01 message status on the K2CAN bus to enHSBruchErrSt signal. Status values are: 0 - no error 1 - timeout error 2 - init value To get the message status, use this function: DWAX_CanMessageErrorStatusHandling.
reentrant No context DWAX_SignalHandle function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous K2CAN_BUS will be used as KCAN_BUS because the interface receives the same output.
Call Sequence

Set the bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv value.

The BCM must provide the status for the relevant qualified error memory entries as logical information, for indicating an ATWS-sensor error in the SafeLED, by means of the data element bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
E_OK [in] DWAX_TASK_DEM_BIT_CHECK [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
E_OK used to check if rte function call succeeded. DWAX_TASK_DEM_BIT_CHECK used to check the activations of some DTCs. DTC 0x04090E = internal error; DTC 0x040904 = no signal/communication DTC 0X040205 = no basic settings for DWA sensor DTC 0x040B08 = unplausible signal for DWA sensor (interior surveillance) DTC 0x040C0E = defect/intrerupt for DWA sensor slave DTC 0x040A08 = unplausible signal for sensor DWA (inclination sensor)
reentrant No context DWAX_SignalHandle function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described on:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check the if bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv is updated accordingly. The value of the data element must be reset if none of the assigned DTCs is qualified. The value of the data element must be set to true if at least one of the assigned DTCs is qualified. TEST_DWAX_Task__DWAX_SignalHandle__bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv Traceability
{SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1480}

Updates signals reponsbile for transport modus and battery reloaded suppressed status.

SubFunction handles misc signals of transmiting into and to DWAX and corresrponding modules. The ATWS-master must send the information regarding the activation / deactivation of the QRS (quick-quiescent current measuring mode) and TRM (transport mode) to the siren via the communication line.
N/A
N/A

Input->Output-Correlation N/A

Set the sounder code error value.

SubFunction handles misc signals of transmiting into and to DWAX and corresrponding modules. The BCM must internally generate the information that the ECU could not generate a master code for the sounder and thus the backup value used (s_SounderMasterCodeErr) and must provide it to the data element bStSGSounderCodeErr as logical information.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals

Call Sequence

Function handles substate of MasterCode generation.

Function used to verify the storage of the MasterCode in NVM and generate MasterCode.
N/A
N/A
*p
- return the state of MasterCode generation. range DWAX_generate_MasterCode_t resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
DWAX_Data.RandomNumber [in] DWAX_Data.NumberOfRetries [in/out] Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode [in/out] DEM_EVENT_STATUS_FAILED [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_SAFEFAIL [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_INCORRECT_VALUE_00 [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_INCORRECT_VALUE_FF [in] DWAX_START_GENERATE_PROCEDURE [in] RTE_E_OK [in] DEM_EVENT_STATUS_PASSED [in] DWAX_WAITING_FOR_SAVE [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode used to store mastercode value. If Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode is either DWAX_MASTERCODE_INCORRECT_VALUE_00 or DWAX_MASTERCODE_INCORRECT_VALUE_FF, the DWAX_Data.NumberOfRetries should be incremented. If no problem occurs, Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode (MasterCode) should be written to Nvm. DWAX_Data.RandomNumber used to calculate the MasterCode Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode. DWAX_Data.NumberOfRetries used to store the maximum number of retries. If it reaches a value greater than 2 then MasterCode should be set to 0, otherwise the MasterCode can be generated.
reentrant No context DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described on:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check the generation of MasterCode. TEST_DWAX_Task__DWAX_MasterCodeGeneration__DWAX_GENERATE_MASTERCODE
Traceability
Satisfies requirement

Function handles substate of MasterCode generation.

Function used to verify the storage of the MasterCode in NVM.
N/A
N/A
*p
- return the state of MasterCode generation. range DWAX_generate_MasterCode_t resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
DWAX_Data.NumberOfRetries [in/out] DWAX_MASTERCODE_MAX_NO_RETRIES [in] Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode [in/out] DEM_EVENT_STATUS_FAILED [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_SAFEFAIL [in] NVM_REQ_OK [in] DWAX_Data.StateOfNvm [in] DEM_EVENT_STATUS_PASSED [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_GENERATED [in] RTE_E_OK [in] DWAX_WAITING_FOR_SAVE
Input->Output-Correlation
DWAX_Data.NumberOfRetries used to store the maximum number of retries. If it reaches a value greater than DWAX_MASTERCODE_MAX_NO_RETRIES then Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode should be set to 0 and DTC 0x040711 set to NOT_OK. If DWAX_Data.StateOfNvm is NVM_REQ_OK, them DTC 0x040711 set to OK, deactivate sounder safe led.

Helper function.

Provides status of CAN message and switches values of init, timeout and no error for DWAX needs. It applies a delay of 1000ms for ErrSt signals.
N/A
N/A
msgStatus
- represents the message status for a specific IPdu range uint8* resolution N/A unit N/A
canNumber_e
- represents the CAN channel ID (CAN, EVCAN, KCAN) range CAN_State resolution N/A unit N/A
uint8 - CAN message state range 0 - no error | 1 - timeout | 2 - init value resolution factor = 1 offset = 0. unit N/A
Globals
RTE_CAN_MIRROR_OFFSET [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
Based on the value received from DWAX_RteLight_pu8GetAddress(), the communication status is set. If there is no error(0) then no error is set. If there is a timeout(2) received from DWAX_RteLight_pu8GetAddress, if the CAN is active and the timeout has expired, then set the timeout status, otherwise consider the initialization phase. If none of the above conditions are met, then consider the initialization phase.
reentrant No context used by those signals that stores the CAN error status thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described on:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to ckeck all possible return values. TEST_DWAX_Task__DWAX_CanMessageErrorStatusHandling
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function to provide the status of CAN message for some errSt signals. The timeout used is descried in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1694.
Helper function.

Provides status of CAN message and switches values of init, timeout and no error for DWAx needs. It applies a delay of 50ms for enAnhaengerErrSt signal in case of NoError transmission (VWICAS23-54096).
N/A
N/A
msgStatus
- represents the message status for a specific IPdu range uint8* resolution N/A unit N/A
canNumber_e
- represents the CAN channel ID range CAN_State resolution N/A unit N/A
uint8 - CAN message state range 0 - no error | 1 - timeout | 2 - init value resolution factor = 1 offset = 0. unit N/A
Globals
RTE_CAN_MIRROR_OFFSET [in] dwax_msgInitDelayCounter_u8 [in/out] DWAX_CAN_INIT_DELAY [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
Based on the value received from DWAX_RteLight_pu8GetAddress(), the communication status is set. If there is no error(0) and the applied delay is not over, then the initialization phase is set and increase dwax_msgInitDelayCounter_u8 value, otherwise no error is set. If there is a timeout(2) received from DWAX_RteLight_pu8GetAddress, if the CAN is active and the timeout has expired, then set the timeout status, otherwise consider the initialization phase. If none of the above conditions are met, then consider the initialization phase.
reentrant No context DWAX_SignalHandle__enAnhaengerErrSt function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Call Sequence

Adapter function of the DWAX module.

Function handles sending arming and Master code signals.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWAX_Data.StateOfMasterCode [in] Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode [in] DWAXMRRAIMUNDFEARS [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_GENERATED [in] DWAX_MASTERCODE_SAFEFAIL [in] DWAFlagScheduleTableRequest [in] DWAX_TASK_scharf [in] DWAX_TASK_unscharf [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If status of DWAX_Data.StateOfMasterCode is either DWAX_MASTERCODE_GENERATED (10U) or DWAX_MASTERCODE_SAFEFAIL (11U), DWA will trasmit to the Siren the MasterCode in order to arm the Siren. Pim_DWAX_SireneMasterCode used to store the MasterCode. DWAXMRRAIMUNDFEARS enables or disables parts of code. DWAFlagScheduleTableRequest, DWAX_TASK_scharf, DWAX_TASK_unscharf used to check if the desired state of arming was reached.
reentrant No context DWAX_TaskCyclicEvent function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
